page.title: 14CLUBS AT CROPWELL BUTLER
page.content: A{Youth Club}for boys and girls aged 9-16 was formed in 1982 by the Village Hall Committee. It was thought that the increasing vandalism in the village, mainly caused by the younger element, was due to lack of facilities in the village for this group. There is an adult Committee Supervisor and the Club meets every Tuesday, 7:30 to 10:00. Some decrease in the vandalism has ensued. {Rendezvous Club.} The welfare of the "Over 60's" is the concern of the Rendezvous Club. They meet on Wednesday afternoons in the Village Hall and play cards or dominoes, or chat over tea. Outings are organised annually. This year a tour of North Yorkshire included a visit to Knaresborough and Richmond.
